nodes.text: Stouker was the name of a company that produced the primary concussion chamber used by the Sissks to construct their signature weapon, the Stouker concussion rifle.

Little else is known about this company or what the intended use of the Stouker concussion chamber was, though the statement that the Stouker concussion rifle was built "from scratch" implies that the concussion chamber may have not originally been intended for use in weapons.
